Header: Devotees of "Hiru Siddhartha Gauthama Dambadiva Wandana" to reach Savath Nuwara (Photos)
Content: The devotees of the "Hiru Siddhartha Gauthama Dambadiva Wandana" will reach Savath Nuwara today (Apr. 02). This programme was initiated by Hiru FM as a gratitude for its listeners and the devotees will undertake this pilgrimage for a period of 12 days. The listeners of radio drama, Siddhartha Gauthama can be a lucky member of the next pilgrimage.
